title: Probability Swing
tags: Avant-Garde Jazz, Glitch, IDM, Experimental, Dark Jazz, Abstract
prompt:
[BREATH]
(hiss)
Blue note air.
Just the space.
Just the waiting for the—

[VERSE 1: FRACTURE]
Graphite horn. Un-draws. Un-draws.
Bell becomes dust.
Bell becomes a maybe-cloud.
Lines scatter.
Probability dots.
Dot dot dot.

[RHYTHM HIT]
Swing-state. swing-state. state-swing-glitch.
One foot tap. one foot falls. one foot never.
The beat stutters. the beat stut-stut-stutters.
The beat is a question.
Is a question.

[SPOKEN WORD: SUPERPOSITION]
And here. In the pause. Before the choice becomes a scar. Every path is real. The yes. The no. The turn away. The leap. All true. All vibrating in the brass throat of the moment. A thousand ghosts of what could be... singing dissonance.

[DROP: DATA CORRUPTION]
Pale blue note escapes.
P-p-pale blue.
Pale.
Blue.
note_error.wav
Sound shatters. Shatters sound.
Sh-sh-sh-sh-shards of sound.
Shards of brass.
Shards of then.
Shards of now. now. now.
n-o-w—

[SILENCE_PIANO]
The finger hovers over the key and...
